input.sentences: these people are gathered for a show .
they all crowd in front of a building .
they wait anxiously for the show to begin .
the lights on the building come on .
everybody is excited | and some take photographs on their phones .
output.sentences: We decided to go out for an evening concert.
Thankfully they had monitors where we could view the action, although the picture was a bit grainy.
You can tell from the crowd that everyone else had the same idea!
There were probably thousands of people there.
It was hard to take pictures, because we were packed so tightly.
